snippet.title: Super Mario Galaxy 63 - Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Mario Galaxy 63 is a modification of Super Mario Galaxy 2 that attempts to recreate and sometimes reimagine the original Super Mario 63 Flash game but in the Super Mario Galaxy engine. This project has been in the works since early 2021 and it has been getting a lot of progress lately.
It's also made by the same people who worked on Super Mario Starshine and it is the spiritual sequel to that mod.
The First release will have 30 stars and is planned to come out by the end of the year. I don't know when exactly it depends on the development. 

Super Mario Galaxy 63 Credits

Modeling - Alex SMG
Level Design - Alex SMG, SPG64, Xandog 
Materials - Alex SMG, Luma48, Kairos, Zyprho
Ast Imports - Alex SMG, Xandog
Text Editing - Evanbowl, SPG64, Alex SMG
Project Template by: Aurum, Someone, Evanbowl and others
Galaxy Level Engine V2 by: Super Hackio
Mario Const Editor: Super Hackio
Other models borrowed from: Kairos, Shadow64, IonicPixles, Super Mario 3D Land, Super Mario Odyssey, Super Smash Bros Ultimate, The Eclipse Team
Special thanks to Project Star World Team for letting me use their modified VROrbit Skybox
Playtesters - Lord-Giganticus, SPG64
Thumbnail by: SPG64


Anyways that's all I hope you're all excited for the Final Release : )
